title: (x) Nice Black Rounded (and nice design btw) - Ultramagnetic Bold {Chris K}
content:
Hello All!

I can't identify that font (tried "what the font"...), and I'm sure I already saw it somewhere, recently I think

[mega shark](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012012804/http:/staubman.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2010/01/megashark-full.jpg)

I'm talking about the titling font, like "DEATH IN THE SKIES" (though it looks like text font is the same one...)

Anybody has an Idea?

Thanx in advance for your reply :)

Baz
author: therealbaaz

comments.content: I've used this font before at an old job and I can't remember it! Not helpful but I wanted to say I like it too.
Looks like it is, thank you very much! :)
